titleStmt.title: A message from the Isle of Wight, brought by Major Cromwell. Coll: Hammond sent for by the Lord Generall, and Col: Ewers to be at the Isle of Wight. Also the chiefe heads of Bishop Ushers sermon. And His Majesties letter to the Parliament: brought this present Munday, Novemb. 27. 1648.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I).

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R. Smithurst, neer Pye-corner,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
